Comment: Yes! Exactly. He was obviously slower mentally, but dementia is a more serious condition than flubbing words, or forgetting a word here and there.  Right wing media made a concentrated coordinated effort to build highlight reels of every Biden flub, and carefully edited videos to make him appear worse.   For example, the clip of Biden "shaken hands with the air" was going around for a year in right wing circles, even Joe Rogan talked about it.   When you actually looked at the full unedited speech, Biden was clearly gesturing to an audience section, who applauded, he then turned to another audience section, made the same gesture, and then they stood and applauded. Right wing media just clipped him gesturing with his hand and then slapped some spooky text that Biden was "shaking hands with nobody".   I swear, weaponized social media is the greatest tool of fascism.
